vlive.korean: 신기한 냄새가 나네 이게 뭐지? It smells funny. What is this? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 떡국 만들기🐥🍲

examples.korean: Electric-powered cars are still something of a novelty. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 전기 자동차는 아직도 신기한 물건이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: This piece of equipment is an exciting new development. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 장비는 신기한 신개발품이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The body is a marvelous machine...a chemical laboratory, a power-house. Every movement, voluntary or involuntary, full of secrets and marvels! (Theodor Herzl) 듣기 Add to Wordbook (몸은) 신기한 장치, 화학 실험실, 발전소다. 자발적이든 비자발적이든 모든 움직임은 신비롭고 경이롭다! (테오도르 헤르츨, 건강명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: The body is a marvelous machine...a chemical laboratory, a power-house. Every movement, voluntary or involuntary, full of secrets and marvels! (Theodor Herzl) Add to Wordbook

examples.english: He put a newfangled odometer on his carriage. Add to Wordbook
